text: Logo of Pizza Celentano Map of restaurants of chain Pizza Celentano is a Ukrainian franchise quick-service pizza restaurant chain. It was founded in 1997 in Lviv. Pizza Celentano pizzeria chain closes all restaurants in Kiev, Glavcom (8 June 2020) There are over 150 restaurants in Ukraine on 2018. Typical locations include motorways, airports, railway stations, high streets, shopping malls and trade fairs. There are sold only whole pizza with a variable number of dressings (some fixed, some seasonal, some special), along with pizza slices calzones and other fast food fares such as soft drink, salads, and desserts are available. Meals can be eaten in the restaurant or purchased for take-away. ==References== == External links == * Франчайзинг мережі Піца Челентано * Fast Food Systems (EGOїсти) Category:Restaurant chains Category:Pizza chains Category:Ukrainian restaurants Category:Restaurants in Ukraine Category:Street food Category:Ukrainian companies established in 1997
title: Pizza Celentano
